explains: vt. 使转向；使偏斜；使弯曲

sentences.en: He raised his arm to try to deflect the blow.
sentences.cn: 他举起手臂试图挡开这一击。

sentences.en: She sought to deflect criticism by blaming her family.
sentences.cn: 她责怪她的家人，想这样来转移对她的批评。

sentences.en: The war did not deflect him from the path he had long ago taken.
sentences.cn: 战争没有使他改变很久之前就选择的道路。
